org.javafxdata.datasources.reader

Interface DataSourceReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileSource, JavaObjectSource, NetworkSource, RestRequest

    public interface DataSourceReader
    This is the interface that is implemented by a number of physical datasources. It is used by protocol implementations that rely on this interface to retrieve the actual data.
    Implementations of this interface should not deal with what parts of the data that have to be rendered.
    Author:
    johan

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Format getInputFormat()
      Return the format of the data in this DataSourceReader.
      InputStream getInputStream()
      return an InputStream that can be read by protocol implementations and that contain the data.

    • Method Detail

      • getInputStream

        InputStream getInputStream()
                           throws IOException
        return an InputStream that can be read by protocol implementations and that contain the data. The format of the data on this InputStream is not specified.
        Returns:
        an InputStream containing data
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getInputFormat

        Format getInputFormat()
        Return the format of the data in this DataSourceReader.
        Returns:
        the format of the data
